descone: The sky is the limit only for those who aren't afraid to fly! To be the first to enter the cosmos, to engage, single-handed, in an unprecedented duel with nature, could one dream of anything more? Let’s go back to the moon y’all! Join the go back to the moon club!
desctwo: I really appreciate your help, if we reach 100 signatures we can make stickers and from there sky's the limit!
titlethree: Thanks a lot bud! we just need some additional info to go to the moon so be a real astronaut here and fill this out!
descthree: Please add some additional info, it's important we have as much personal info from you as possible so we can get to the moon!
